video.title: Secrets of the Bible
video.synopsis: From the parting of the Red Sea to the Tower of Babel, this series follows adventurers and experts as they search for evidence of biblical events.

episodes.synopsis: Historian Tudor Parfitt claims a tribe in southern Africa can be traced back to the Old Testament Jews and may hold clues to the Ark of the Covenant.
episodes.title: Tudor Parfitt and the Lost Tribe of Israel

episodes.synopsis: Countless sleuths have scoured the globe for the cup Jesus used at the Last Supper. One researcher believes he has finally solved the mystery.
episodes.title: The Holy Grail

episodes.synopsis: Egyptologist David Rohl says he's uncovered a biblical mix-up that may reveal the true location of the Tower of Babel, where God introduced language.
episodes.title: The Tower of Babel

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the Ten Plagues of Egypt, a doctor discovers a deadly chain of cause and effect, and a scientist seeks a central triggering event.
episodes.title: The Ten Plagues

episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist claims physical evidence dug up at the ancient site of Jericho offers proof of the bloodiest episode in the Old Testament.
episodes.title: The Fall of Jericho

episodes.synopsis: Millionaires, scholars and spies converge in the story of the Jehoash Tablet, a controversial artifact that sparked a high-profile fraud trial.
episodes.title: The Temple of Solomon Mystery

episodes.synopsis: A renowned Cambridge professor offers a new take on the Exodus story, tracing an alternate route that places Mt. Sinai at the site of a volcano.
episodes.title: The Real Exodus

episodes.synopsis: A historian who believes he's proved that the legendary Stone of Jacob is in the U.K. gets a chance to test his theory when the rock changes hands.
episodes.title: The Stone of Jacob

episodes.synopsis: A former cop and a computer software engineer set out to solve the mystery of where the Red Sea parted and reach two very different conclusions.
episodes.title: Parting of the Red Sea

episodes.synopsis: Following clues in the Bible, an archaeologist unearths the ruins of a city destroyed in a fiery apocalypse and sets out to prove it's Sodom.
episodes.title: The Search for Sodom

episodes.synopsis: A historical detective hunting for the staff of Moses believes he has tracked it through famous hands to a surprising location.
episodes.title: The Staff of Moses

episodes.synopsis: Medieval forgery or burial cloth of Christ? An Italian professor believes his tests will shed new light on the controversy around the Turin Shroud.
episodes.title: The Turin Shroud

episodes.synopsis: Two American oceanographers set out to find the truth behind the most apocalyptic story in the Old Testament: the Great Flood.
episodes.title: The Great Flood
